CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this field with a formula to convert the annual interest rate to the calculated monthly interest rate when the default equation Annual Interest Rate / 12 = Monthly Interest Rate is not applicable. The system uses this field for Rate & Payment Structure calculations if the Monthly_Interest_Rate_Field field on Product Feature contains the value Calculated_Monthly_Interest_Rate. This field is not editable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the formula to calculate the conversion from annual interest rate to monthly interest rate.
CustomField.label: Calculated Monthly Interest Rate
